lines.d: JoeRunner wears an orange long‐sleeved shirt with a black stripe and blue jeans. He sits at a desktop computer open to a word processor, typing on the keyboard.

first version in 1215. Even 800 years after its original issuance, the Magna Carta continues to be relevant today as a symbol and foundation for democracy and liberty, an influence of the United States constitution, and a lasting presence in the United Kingdom. (page break) WORKS CITED
